name: mattydread
text: That last panel is gold.

name: suprememongoose
text: Agreed!

name: havenless
text: Coconut rum is the gay drink of choice for all occasions!

name: petro
text: A comment left by petro was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pwb, lumley, haff)

name: havenless
text: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

name: straw
text: Nice icon/comment synergy

name: jesler729
text: For both of his comments, really.

name: badganjil
text: I think Long Island Iced Tea is a tough drink. There's so much alcohol in it, it tastes almost like nothing.

name: straw
text: That means you need to add more tequila.

name: hipjiverobot
text: It tastes like burning.

name: tekende
text: Then it wasn't well made. A good Long Island iced tea tastes slightly like lemonade or sweet 'n' sour, but mostly like nothing.

name: hipjiverobot
text: I have never had a Long Island iced tea and was not expecting a follow up. Damn you, sir.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Roast Beef has such a detailed doom imagination.

name: i_love_kate
text: Darker or not than the apocalyptic machinery, just mowing us all down?

name: yingkaixing
text: This proposed timeline is definitely darker. At least the doom machines provide an end. Randy provides instead another dimension of instability and shitty mixed drinks.

name: the_doz
text:
#Randy_cant_miss_spin_class_or_he_gets_grumpy

#Randys_Corgi_needs_a_five_thousand_dollar_operation

#Randy_shows_you_his_Will_and_Grace_fanfiction

name: ssddr
text: Someone admiring his shoulders is enough to set him off.

name: salo
text: A pity! Such lovely shoulders needs protection !

name: i_love_kate
text: Please tell me that you are not named after a film.

name: salo
text:
It's the other way around actually.
Funny story that, by the way...

name: mashuren
text: Well, they ARE very nice shoulders.

name: eric
text: I imageine the man he mentions is Hiram the Blacksmith. And gramma K is all looking at them with spit and vinegar.

name: epicurus
text: Because of the running coconut rum = gay thing I am always self-conscious now to drink any sort of flavoured rum, like a thousand eyes are judging me.

name: killerlimpet
text: why?

name: epicurus
text: Because I ain't need no Michelin man brushing against me in the hallway because I was trying to get crazy on some pineapple rum

name: boredom_man
text: More importantly, why were you drinking flavored rum?

name: deancain29
text: So vivid

name: scramblesthedog
text: Alt Text:  "Dad this is Randy"

name: morphingball
text: Funnily enough, this alt text seems to contradict the later revelation that Beef's father was killed by his mother some time ago. It's just a throwaway line about coming out, though. With coconut rum and a guy named Randy and all.

name: tinhand
text: Personally I love coconut rum but that doesn't make me gay. Weird how it doesn't at all taste like coconut though.

name: nabeel84
text: Shameful this strips rating is so low.

name: chomopomomofo
text: I'm gayer than all get out and coconut rum and I do not get along.  I'm all "hey you taste like death" and it's all "hey I make you like that AC/DC song"

name: cpnglxynchos
text: chubby for your dialogue with coconut rum. you're all and it's all and we're all...just great.

name: stuart
text: I'd imagine people would think they were a couple.

name: ttagxamm
text: It's fairly impressive that Onstad can make the tired old gay panic scenario as funny as this comic. That first panel is so sitcommy it could practically be scored with a wah-wah trombone . But five panels later there's Beef and imaginary Randy steeling themselves with dessert drinks for dinner with the Kazenzakis. No macho bluster -- it's not about some perceived challenge to his masculinity but the near possibility of even more worry in his life.

name: riazm
text: I was impressed by the way he ensured we knew it was a gay bar in panel three.

name: lahnnabell
text: Haha, my fabulously gay boss is named Randy.  And I bet he totally drinks coconut rum.

name: jonnay
text: Because of this strip, I will never drink coconut rum.  I don't want to end up trying to explain myself at Christmastime.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
somewhere in the peppermint honcho is hiram the blacksmith
turns out he made that trip to the future

name: charchar
text: The firts time I ever got royally hammered was on coconut rum mixed with Mello Yello.  God, I am so lame.

name: charchar
text: so lame I can't spell 'first,' evidently.

name: snowman
text: The first time I got wasted I was drinking straight Smirnoff's (no ice) out of a Yahtzee cup.

name: wittyname
text: My first time was taking shots of whiskey, first from shot glasses and then straight from the bottle. I don't remember much.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Vodka shots with my friend and her Russian boyfriend. He might have told me that after taking a vodka shot in Russia, they take a bite out of a pickle.

Whether or not it's true, it's delicious .

name: tellumo
text: I once went to a bar (not a gay bar, but then again, it was in San Francisco) that sold me a mojito made with coconut rum. That was bad enough, but then we looked at the menu and saw that yes, the description of their mojito said that it used coconut rum. They meant to do that.

name: jhunter
text:
the first time i drank a mojito i ordered it and sounded out the "t"
i asked for a "mo-ji-toe".
i've never recovered.
